item.title: Don't pay to meditate
item.description: The other day, my Twitter feed informed me Penn Jilette just clocked in 1000 consecutive days of meditation using the Headspace app. Now he’s considering checking out Sam Harris’s new Waking Up meditation app. Sam left a congratulatory comment on Penn’s tweet. {{< tweet 1048730683940646914 >}} The whole thing was lovely. And it reminded me to pass on some advice: Stop using fee-based meditation apps! Headspace is popular and highly-rated. It’s free to download and has some nice features, like reminders to meditate.
